SELECT tb.*,tb.basket_count as prod_count ,tb.basket_count as prod_count,
IF(uc.id,TRUE,FALSE) AS is_collection, tsd.shop_name FROM tz_basket tb LEFT JOIN tz_shop_detail tsd ON tb.shop_id = tsd.shop_id LEFT JOIN tz_user_collection uc ON uc.prod_id = tb.prod_id AND tb.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN tz_prod tp ON tb.prod_id = tp.prod_id WHERE tsd.shop_status = 1 AND tb.user_id = #{userId} and tp.pre_sell_status != 1 ORDER BY tb.`basket_id` DESC

SELECT tb.*,tb.basket_count as prod_count,tsd.shop_name FROM tz_basket tb LEFT JOIN tz_shop_detail tsd ON tb.shop_id = tsd.shop_id WHERE tsd.shop_status = 1 AND tb.is_checked = 1 AND tb.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tb.`basket_id` DESC

SELECT tb.*,tb.basket_count AS prod_count,tsd.shop_name,tp.pic,tp.price,tp.ori_price,tp.brief,ts.properties, ifnull(pl.prod_name, tp.prod_name) as prod_name, ifnull(sl.sku_name, ts.sku_name) as sku_name FROM tz_basket tb LEFT JOIN tz_shop_detail tsd ON tb.shop_id = tsd.shop_id LEFT JOIN tz_prod tp ON tb.prod_id = tp.prod_id LEFT JOIN tz_prod_lang pl ON pl.prod_id = tp.prod_id AND pl.lang = #{lang} LEFT JOIN tz_sku ts ON tb.sku_id = ts.sku_id LEFT JOIN tz_sku_lang sl ON ts.sku_id = sl.sku_id AND sl.lang = #{lang} WHERE (tp.status != 1 or ts.is_delete = 1 OR ts.status !=1 or (tp.pre_sell_status = 1 and tp.status = 1 and tb.combo_id = 0)) AND tb.user_id = #{userId} and tp.status > -1 and ts.status >-1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tz_basket WHERE basket_id IN( SELECT basket_id FROM ( SELECT tb.basket_id basket_id FROM tz_basket tb LEFT JOIN tz_shop_detail tsd ON tb.shop_id = tsd.shop_id LEFT JOIN tz_prod tp ON tb.prod_id = tp.prod_id LEFT JOIN tz_sku ts ON tb.sku_id = ts.sku_id WHERE (tp.status !=1 OR ts.is_delete = 1 OR ts.status !=1 or ((tp.pre_sell_status = 1 and tp.status = 1 and tb.combo_id = 0))) AND tb.user_id = #{userId}) AS temp)
